header.#text: Study on modernization and simplification of regulation S-K

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall carry out a study of the requirements contained in
			 regulation S-K (17 C.F.R. 229.10 et seq.). Such study shall—

text.#text:
determine how best to modernize and simplify such requirements in a manner that reduces the costs
			 and burdens on issuers while still providing all material information;

emphasize a company by company approach that allows relevant and material information to be
			 disseminated to investors without boilerplate language or static
			 requirements while preserving completeness and comparability of
			 information across registrants; and

evaluate methods of information delivery and presentation and explore methods for discouraging
			 repetition and the disclosure of immaterial information.
